name: FeatureManagement
description: Use the methods in the System.FeatureManagement class to check and modify the values of feature parameters, and to show or hide custom objects and custom permissions in your subscribers’ orgs.

changeprotection(string,string,string).name: changeProtection
changeprotection(string,string,string).signature: public static void changeProtection(String apiName, String typeApiName, String protection)
changeprotection(string,string,string).overrideSignature: public static override void changeProtection(String apiName, String typeApiName, String protection)
changeprotection(string,string,string).description: Hides or reveals custom permissions, or reveals custom objects, in your subscriber’s org.

protection.name: protection
protection.description: The API name of the custom object or custom permission to show or hide—for example, 'MyCustomObject__c' or 'MyCustomPermission'. The API name of the type that you want to show or hide: 'CustomObject' or 'CustomPermission'.  To show a custom object or custom permission, 'Unprotected'.  To hide a custom permission, 'Protected'.

checkpackagebooleanvalue(string).name: checkPackageBooleanValue
checkpackagebooleanvalue(string).overrideSignature: public static override Boolean checkPackageBooleanValue(String apiName)
checkpackagebooleanvalue(string).description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You set the record’s value using setPackageBooleanValue(apiName, value).

apiname.name: apiName
apiname.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'SpecialAccessAvailable'.

checkpackagedatevalue(string).name: checkPackageDateValue
checkpackagedatevalue(string).overrideSignature: public static override Date checkPackageDateValue(String apiName)
checkpackagedatevalue(string).description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterDate__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can set the record’s value using setPackageDateValue(apiName, value).

apiname.name: apiName
apiname.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'TrialExpirationDate'.

checkpackageintegervalue(string).name: checkPackageIntegerValue
checkpackageintegervalue(string).overrideSignature: public static override Integer checkPackageIntegerValue(String apiName)
checkpackageintegervalue(string).description: Checks the value__c value of the FeatureParameterInteger__c record for a feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can set the record’s value using setPackageIntegerValue(apiName, value).

apiname.name: apiName
apiname.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to check—for example, 'NumberOfLicenses'.

checkpermission(string).name: checkPermission
checkpermission(string).overrideSignature: public static override Boolean checkPermission(String apiName)
checkpermission(string).description: Checks whether a custom permission is enabled.

apiname.name: apiName
apiname.description: The API name of the custom permission to check the value of—for example, 'MyCustomPermission'.

setpackagebooleanvalue(string,boolean).name: setPackageBooleanValue
setpackagebooleanvalue(string,boolean).signature: public static void setPackageBooleanValue(String apiName, Boolean value)
setpackagebooleanvalue(string,boolean).overrideSignature: public static override void setPackageBooleanValue(String apiName, Boolean value)
setpackagebooleanvalue(string,boolean).description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageBooleanValue(apiName).

value.name: value
value.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'SpecialAccessAvailable'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterBoolean__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.

setpackagedatevalue(string,date).name: setPackageDateValue
setpackagedatevalue(string,date).signature: public static void setPackageDateValue(String apiName, Date value)
setpackagedatevalue(string,date).overrideSignature: public static override void setPackageDateValue(String apiName, Date value)
setpackagedatevalue(string,date).description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterDate__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageDateValue(apiName).

value.name: value
value.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'TrialExpirationDate'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterDate__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.

setpackageintegervalue(string,integer).name: setPackageIntegerValue
setpackageintegervalue(string,integer).signature: public static void setPackageIntegerValue(String apiName, Integer value)
setpackageintegervalue(string,integer).overrideSignature: public static override void setPackageIntegerValue(String apiName, Integer value)
setpackageintegervalue(string,integer).description: Sets the value__c value of the FeatureParameterInteger__c record for a subscriber-to-LMO feature parameter in your subscriber’s org. You can check the record’s value using checkPackageIntegerValue(apiName).

value.name: value
value.description: The fullName__c value of the feature parameter whose value you want to set—for example, 'NumberOfLicenses'. The value to assign to the value__c field on the FeatureParameterInteger__c record that associates the feature parameter with its related license.
